## Heading 2

### Heading 3

Regular paragraph with **bold**, *italic*, ***bold italic***, ~~strikethrough~~, and `inline code`.

> A blockquote
> spanning lines

> [!note]
> An admonition

- Unordered item 1
- Unordered item 2
  - Nested item

1. Ordered item
2. Another item

- [ ] Open task
- [x] Completed task

[Link text](https://example.com)
[[WikiLink]]
<https://inline.link>

| Col A | Col B |
|-------|-------|
| 1     | 2     |

```rust
fn main() {
    println!("Hello");
}
```
